item.title: Clean R environment but...
item.description: Example to remove everything from the environment, except an object called sobj: #!/usr/bin/R rm(list = setdiff(ls(), "sobj"))

item.title: Increase the size of the legend keys
Subset the i-th elements of a nested list
item.description: Code Select all i-th elements of a nested list x, in R language: #!/usr/bin/R lapply(x, `[[`, i) This is useful after having used the stringr::str_split functionâ€¦ Input Structure of the input list x: x â”œâ”€â”€ A â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ A_1 â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ A_2 â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ A_3 â”‚Â â””â”€â”€ A_4 â”œâ”€â”€ B â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ B_1 â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ B_2 â”‚Â â”œâ”€â”€ B_3 â”‚Â â””â”€â”€ B_4 â””â”€â”€ C â”œâ”€â”€ C_1 â”œâ”€â”€ C_2 â”œâ”€â”€ C_3 â””â”€â”€ C_4 Output Structure, after execution of the command (i = 2):
